question_text: Which of the following settings or behaviors might cause unintentional data cap overages? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Automatic app updates over mobile data
Cloud photo backup enabled on cellular
High-definition video streaming with sync enabled
Device is connected only to public Wi-Fi networks
correct_answer: Automatic app updates over mobile data
Cloud photo backup enabled on cellular
High-definition video streaming with sync enabled
explanation: Each of these actions can consume large amounts of mobile data. Public Wi-Fi use does not impact a mobile data cap directly.
